else.title: Auth Complete Successfully!
else.text: Proceed with saveCache for preview feature

commands.title: en > gettoken
commands.subtitle: Get OAuth token by your evernote account

commands.title: en > clearcache
commands.subtitle: Clean all quicklook cache of alfred-evernote-workflow

commands.title: This work could take several minutes.
commands.subtitle: You'll get a notification when the caching is complete.

action.title: Note created!
action.text: The contents of the note have been copied to the clipboard.

then.title: Json format error
then.text: After en > clearcache, carry out en > savecache. If the error is not gone, pls check the issue.

commands.title: enct
commands.subtitle: Select tag and enter note content to create.

action.subtitle: Please enter note content to create.

action.title: Note created!
action.text: The contents of the note have been copied to the clipboard.

commands.title: entodo
commands.subtitle: Search for notes with check boxes.

commands.title: encl
commands.subtitle: Create a note with the contents of the clipboard.

action.title: Clip complete
action.text: The text on the clipboard is made into a note.

commands.title: enclo
commands.subtitle: Create a note with the contents of the clipboard and open

commands.title: enclf
commands.subtitle: Create a note with copied files
